column5: Amazing, newly remodeled 2 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath beach front condo located within walking distance (less than 1 mile) to great restaurants, beachfront bars, live music and shopping on beautiful South Padre Island. Come visit our little piece of heaven!  NOTE: RATES INCLUDE SPI CITY TAX OF 8.5%, COUNTY TAXES OF .5% PLUS A VENUE TAX OF 2%...YOU WILL ALSO BE CHARGED AN ADDITIONAL TEXAS STATE TAX OF 6% BY AIRBNB (TOTAL MANDATORY HOTEL OCCUPANCY TAX ON SPI IS 17%).
column8: EVERY day is a BEACH day!!!
